net.sourceforge.xmlfacade

Class XmlFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.xmlfacade.XmlFacade

  • public final class XmlFacade
extends Object
    Utilities class for easier XML creation and querying.

    • Method Detail

      • createDocument

        public static Document createDocument()
        Creates new empty document.
        Returns:
        new document

      • createElement

        public static Element createElement(Document d,
                    QName name,
                    Object... contents)
        Creates element with specified name and contens. Type of objects in contents can be one of the following: org.w3c.dom.Attr, org.w3c.dom.Node, java.lang.String and Iterable or array which can again contain objects with all mentioned types.
        Parameters:
        d - document used as factory for creating element
        name - qualified name
        contents - element contents
        Returns:
        new element with specified name and contens

      • createAttribute

        public static Attr createAttribute(Document d,
                   QName name,
                   String value)
        Creates attribute with specified name and value.
        Parameters:
        d - document used as factory for creating attribute
        name - qualified name
        value - attribute value
        Returns:
        new attribute with specified qualified name and value

      • getAttribute

        public static Attr getAttribute(Element parent,
                QName name)
        Returns attribute with specified name. If such attribute doesn't exist returns null.
        Parameters:
        parent - queried Element
        name - qualified name
        Returns:
        attribute with specified name. If such attribute doesn't exist returns null

           File file,
           XmlSaveOptions options)

        Parameters:
        node - XML Node to save
        file - File where to save XML
        options - can be used for disabling formatting (indenting)
        Throws:
